title: "Daily Purchase Limit" on Mystery Champions?
body:
I just bought several "Mystery Champion" items from the BE Store, and am now seeing the following message:

>You have reached your daily purchase limit for your item. Please allow at least 24 hours before attempting another purchase of the item.

Firstly, I was completely unaware of this limit, and if it intentionally exists, is there somewhere that I can read about it?

Second, this message is now appearing on all of the items in the BE Store for me, not just the "Mystery Champion". (Ex: BE Emotes, Mystery Ward, Mystery Mini Icons, etc).

Is this intentional? If so, does this really reset "24 hours after the last purchase", or does it reset at a certain time of day?

Any info is appreciated, thanks.

replies.body: Fudge Cakes! The moment you decide to spend your 230k BE on  some mystery icons, only to find out about this limit, and that tomorrow is the last day...  {{item:3073}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3073}}

Hey!  We have this up on our Essence Emporium FAQ, but many of the items in the BE shop share a limit of 10 purchases per day.

> Mystery Minis, mystery icons, mystery ward skins, and mystery champions share a limit of 10 purchases per day. That means any combination of those items up to ten will prevent you from buying any more of those items until 24 hours after your first purchase.

More info on our [FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088)but I hope that helps clear things up.  :D
Tsk, tsk!  :P  Trust me, I've missed some things too.  :)
Oh that's hilarious. If they put a daily purchase limit of BE on the game now, that's going to be very bad.
